explanation: Red or droopy eyes indicate tiredness
No recent caffeine may reduce alertness
Low oil increases engine damage risk
Low fuel can cause unexpected stops
Older drivers may have slower reactions
Long time without food reduces energy
Fatigue may cause accidents but not always
There is a low risk while driving with some fatigue
If there is no major risk then the final risk is low
if any of the risks is high then the final risk is high
if there is 2 medium risks then the final risk is high
if there is 2 medium risks then the final risk is high
if there is 2 medium risks then the final risk is high

conditions: (driver_risk==medium OR car_risk==medium OR external_risk==medium)AND ( (driver_risk==medium AND car_risk==low AND external_risk==low) OR (driver_risk==low AND car_risk==medium AND external_risk==low) OR (driver_risk==low AND car_risk==low AND external_risk==medium))
explanation: if one risk is at medium and the other risks are at low then the final risk is medium
if there is 2 high risks then the final risk is critical
if there is 2 high risks then the final risk is critical
if there is 2 high risks then the final risk is critical
